title: Capitalize muscle group display text

requirements.text: Transform all muscle group text to display with capitalized first letters (e.g., 'chest' → 'Chest', 'back' → 'Back', 'legs' → 'Legs') wherever muscle groups are shown in the UI, including the ExerciseCard badges, ExerciseLibrary filter buttons, and exercise creation/edit forms

quotes: make it so the "muscle group" is always capitalized

acceptanceCriteria: All muscle group text displays with the first letter capitalized throughout the application
Capitalization is applied consistently in ExerciseCard component badges
Capitalization is applied in ExerciseLibrary page filter buttons
Capitalization is applied in exercise creation and edit dialogs
Backend data storage format remains unchanged (lowercase)
Transformation is applied at display time only

constraints: Do not modify the backend data schema or storage format for muscle groups
Preserve existing muscle group validation logic in backend
nonGoals: Changing the backend muscle group data format
